word[0]: on the tip of your tongue
definition[0]: if something is on the tip of your tongue, you really want to say it, but then you decide not to
example[0]: It was on the tip of my tongue to say, ‘I’d rather have dinner with a snake.’
definition[1]: if a word, name etc is on the tip of your tongue, you know it but cannot remember it
example[1]: What is her name? It’s on the tip of my tongue. Joan. Joan Simpson. That’s it!
